source.@value:
pipeline "Desktop Firewalls"
stage 0 match either
rule "Parse - Firewall - GROK"
stage 1 match either
rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - Internal Destination"
rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - Internal Source"
rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - External Destination"
rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - External Source"
end

pipeline "Routing"
stage 0 match either
rule "Route - Desktop Firewall - MS Logs"
end

rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - External Destination"
when
    has_field("destination_ip") && NOT
    (   cidr_match(
        cidr: "192.168.0.0/16", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "10.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "172.16.0.0/12", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "127.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) 
    )
then
set_field("destination_is_external",true);
end

rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - External Source"
when
    has_field("source_ip") && NOT
    (   cidr_match(
        cidr: "192.168.0.0/16", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "10.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "172.16.0.0/12", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "127.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) 
    )
then
set_field("source_is_external",true);
end

rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - Internal Destination"
when
    has_field("destination_ip") &&
    (   cidr_match(
        cidr: "192.168.0.0/16", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "10.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "172.16.0.0/12", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "127.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.destination_ip)
        ) 
    )
then
set_field("destination_is_internal",true);
end

rule "Context - Desktop Firewalls - Internal Source"
when
    has_field("source_ip") &&
    (   cidr_match(
        cidr: "192.168.0.0/16", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "10.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "172.16.0.0/12", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) OR
        cidr_match(
        cidr: "127.0.0.0/8", 
        ip: to_ip($message.source_ip)
        ) 
    )
then
set_field("source_is_internal",true);
end
